title: Gone with the Woof
description: When Melanie’s Aunt Peg volunteers her to help one of dogdom’s elder statesmen write his memoirs, Melanie has no idea what she’s getting into. Edward March turns out to be a crotchety, manipulating philanderer and when his adult son Andrew is killed in a hit-and-run crash, March quickly becomes the prime suspect.Drawn into the investigation, Melanie uncovers family discord, secret hoarding, and two generations of disgruntled ex-lovers. Melanie—busy with her own child who’s about to enter the terrible twos, not to mention a new puppy for Davey—must follow a convoluted trail of clues, but before she can act on what she uncovers, the killer prepares to strike again and this time she’s is the target…
author: Laurien Berenson
